sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
	def1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT,
	dpt1.NAME as DIRPARTYTABLE1_NAME_DEPARTMENT,
	dft1.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_INTERCOMPANY,
	dft2.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_SALES_CHANNEL,
	dft3.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_TYPE,
	dft4.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_CATEGORY,
	dft5.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_FAMILY,
	dft6.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_SIZE,
	dft7.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_VERSION,
	dft8.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_FOAM_SOURCED,
	dpt2.NAME as DIRPARTYTABLE2_NAME_STORE,
	dpt3.NAME as DIRPARTYTABLE3_NAME_BUSINESS_UNIT,
	def1.DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME as LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
    (select distinct davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'A_Department' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'B_Intercompany' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'C_Sales_Channel' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'D_Type' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'E_Category' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'F_Family' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'G_Size' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'H_Version' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'K_Foam_Sourced' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'L_Store' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'BusinessUnit' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT
	, max(
		(select max(i) from (values (davsi1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dav1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (desc1.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i))
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESETITEM davsi1
left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE dav1 on
	davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE = dav1.RECID
left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da1 on
	dav1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da1.RECID
left join (select dft1.VALUE, da2.NAME, dft1.DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID) desc1 on
	davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE = desc1.VALUE and
	da1.NAME = desc1.NAME
) def1
left join (select OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
			, max(NAME) as NAME
		from dbo.DIRPARTYTABLE
		group by OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER) dpt1 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT = dpt1.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'B_Intercompany') dft1 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY = dft1.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'C_Sales_Channel') dft2 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL = dft2.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'D_Type') dft3 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE = dft3.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'E_Category') dft4 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY = dft4.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'F_Family') dft5 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY = dft5.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'G_Size') dft6 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE = dft6.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'H_Version') dft7 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION = dft7.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'K_Foam_Sourced') dft8 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED = dft8.VALUE
left join (select OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
			, max(NAME) as NAME
		from dbo.DIRPARTYTABLE
		group by OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER) dpt2 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE = dpt2.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
left join (select OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
			, max(NAME) as NAME
		from dbo.DIRPARTYTABLE
		group by OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER) dpt3 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT = dpt3.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
where
	convert(
		varchar(25),
		isnull(
			def1.DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
			'1950-01-01'
		),
		120
	) > '@{variables('v_prv_max_upd_timestamp')}'

select
	def1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE,
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT,
	dpt1.NAME as DIRPARTYTABLE1_NAME_DEPARTMENT,
	dft1.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_INTERCOMPANY,
	dft2.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_SALES_CHANNEL,
	dft3.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_TYPE,
	dft4.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_CATEGORY,
	dft5.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_FAMILY,
	dft6.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_SIZE,
	dft7.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_VERSION,
	dft8.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_FOAM_SOURCED,
	dpt2.NAME as DIRPARTYTABLE2_NAME_STORE,
	dpt3.NAME as DIRPARTYTABLE3_NAME_BUSINESS_UNIT,
	def1.DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME as LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
    (select distinct davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'A_Department' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'B_Intercompany' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'C_Sales_Channel' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'D_Type' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'E_Category' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'F_Family' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'G_Size' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'H_Version' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'K_Foam_Sourced' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'L_Store' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'BusinessUnit' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT
	, max(
		(select max(i) from (values (davsi1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dav1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (desc1.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i))
		) over (partition by davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET) as DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESETITEM davsi1
left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE dav1 on
	davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE = dav1.RECID
left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da1 on
	dav1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da1.RECID
left join (select dft1.VALUE, da2.NAME, dft1.DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID) desc1 on
	davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE = desc1.VALUE and
	da1.NAME = desc1.NAME
) def1
left join (select OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
			, max(NAME) as NAME
		from dbo.DIRPARTYTABLE
		group by OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER) dpt1 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT = dpt1.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'B_Intercompany') dft1 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY = dft1.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'C_Sales_Channel') dft2 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL = dft2.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'D_Type') dft3 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE = dft3.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'E_Category') dft4 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY = dft4.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'F_Family') dft5 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY = dft5.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'G_Size') dft6 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE = dft6.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'H_Version') dft7 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION = dft7.VALUE
left join (select dft10.VALUE, dft10.DESCRIPTION
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc10 on
				dft10.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc10.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da10 on
				dadc10.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da10.RECID
			where da10.NAME = 'K_Foam_Sourced') dft8 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED = dft8.VALUE
left join (select OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
			, max(NAME) as NAME
		from dbo.DIRPARTYTABLE
		group by OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER) dpt2 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE = dpt2.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
left join (select OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
			, max(NAME) as NAME
		from dbo.DIRPARTYTABLE
		group by OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER) dpt3 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT = dpt3.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
where
	convert(
		varchar(25),
		isnull(
			def1.DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
			'1950-01-01'
		),
		120
	) > '@{variables('v_prv_max_upd_timestamp')}'

select 
def1.dimensionattributevalueset as DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET,
def1.DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT,
def1.DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY,
def1.DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL,
def1.DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE,
def1.DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY,
def1.DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY,
def1.DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE,
def1.DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION,
def1.DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED,
def1.DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE,
def1.DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT,
dpt1.NAME as DIRPARTYTABLE1_NAME_DEPARTMENT,
dft1.description as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_INTERCOMPANY,
dft2.description as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_SALES_CHANNEL,
dft3.description as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_TYPE,
dft4.description as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_CATEGORY,
dft5.description as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_FAMILY,
dft6.description as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_SIZE,
dft7.description as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_VERSION,
dft8.description as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_FOAM_SOURCED,
dpt2.NAME as DIRPARTYTABLE2_NAME_STORE,
dpt3.NAME as DIRPARTYTABLE3_NAME_BUSINESS_UNIT,
def1.DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME as LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
(select distinct davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
	, max(
		case when da1.name = 'A_Department' then davsi1.displayvalue
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset) as DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT
	, max(
		case when da1.name = 'B_Intercompany' then davsi1.displayvalue
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset) as DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY
	, max(
		case when da1.name = 'C_Sales_Channel' then davsi1.displayvalue
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset) as DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL
	, max(
		case when da1.name = 'D_Type' then davsi1.displayvalue
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset) as DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE
	, max(
		case when da1.name = 'E_Category' then davsi1.displayvalue
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset) as DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY
	, max(
		case when da1.name = 'F_Family' then davsi1.displayvalue
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset) as DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY
	, max(
		case when da1.name = 'G_Size' then davsi1.displayvalue
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset) as DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE
	, max(
		case when da1.name = 'H_Version' then davsi1.displayvalue
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset) as DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION
	, max(
		case when da1.name = 'K_Foam_Sourced' then davsi1.displayvalue
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset) as DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED
	, max(
		case when da1.name = 'L_Store' then davsi1.displayvalue
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset) as DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE
	, max(
		case when da1.name = 'BusinessUnit' then davsi1.displayvalue
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset) as DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT
	, max(
		(select max(i) from (values (davsi1.modifieddatetime), (dav1.modifieddatetime), (da1.modifieddatetime), (desc1.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME)) as t(i))
		) over (partition by davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset) as DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributevaluesetitem davsi1
left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributevalue dav1 on
	davsi1.dimensionattributevalue = dav1.recid
left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da1 on
	dav1.dimensionattribute = da1.recid
left join (select dft1.value, da2.name, dft1.description
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.modifieddatetime), (dadc1.modifieddatetime), (da2.modifieddatetime)) as t(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag dft1
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributedircategory dadc1 on
				dft1.financialtagcategory = dadc1.dircategory
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da2 on
				dadc1.dimensionattribute = da2.recid) desc1 on
	davsi1.displayvalue = desc1.value and
	da1.name = desc1.name
) def1
left join (select oou1.omoperatingunitnumber
			, max(dpt1.name) as NAME
		from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dirpartytable dpt1
		inner join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.omoperatingunit oou1 on
			dpt1.recid = oou1.recid
		where oou1.omoperatingunitnumber is not null
		group by oou1.omoperatingunitnumber) dpt1 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT = dpt1.omoperatingunitnumber
left join (select dft10.value, max(dft10.description) as description
			from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag dft10
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributedircategory dadc10 on
				dft10.financialtagcategory = dadc10.dircategory
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da10 on
				dadc10.dimensionattribute = da10.recid
			where da10.name = 'B_Intercompany'
			group by dft10.value) dft1 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY = dft1.value
left join (select dft10.value, max(dft10.description) as description
			from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag dft10
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributedircategory dadc10 on
				dft10.financialtagcategory = dadc10.dircategory
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da10 on
				dadc10.dimensionattribute = da10.recid
			where da10.name = 'C_Sales_Channel'
			group by dft10.value) dft2 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL = dft2.value
left join (select dft10.value, max(dft10.description) as description
			from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag dft10
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributedircategory dadc10 on
				dft10.financialtagcategory = dadc10.dircategory
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da10 on
				dadc10.dimensionattribute = da10.recid
			where da10.name = 'D_Type'
			group by dft10.value) dft3 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE = dft3.value
left join (select dft10.value, max(dft10.description) as description
			from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag dft10
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributedircategory dadc10 on
				dft10.financialtagcategory = dadc10.dircategory
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da10 on
				dadc10.dimensionattribute = da10.recid
			where da10.name = 'E_Category'
			group by dft10.value) dft4 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY = dft4.value
left join (select dft10.value, max(dft10.description) as description
			from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag dft10
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributedircategory dadc10 on
				dft10.financialtagcategory = dadc10.dircategory
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da10 on
				dadc10.dimensionattribute = da10.recid
			where da10.name = 'F_Family'
			group by dft10.value) dft5 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY = dft5.value
left join (select dft10.value, max(dft10.description) as description
			from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag dft10
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributedircategory dadc10 on
				dft10.financialtagcategory = dadc10.dircategory
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da10 on
				dadc10.dimensionattribute = da10.recid
			where da10.name = 'G_Size'
			group by dft10.value) dft6 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE = dft6.value
left join (select dft10.value, max(dft10.description) as description
			from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag dft10
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributedircategory dadc10 on
				dft10.financialtagcategory = dadc10.dircategory
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da10 on
				dadc10.dimensionattribute = da10.recid
			where da10.name = 'H_Version'
			group by dft10.value) dft7 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION = dft7.value
left join (select dft10.value, max(dft10.description) as description
			from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag dft10
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributedircategory dadc10 on
				dft10.financialtagcategory = dadc10.dircategory
			left join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da10 on
				dadc10.dimensionattribute = da10.recid
			where da10.name = 'K_Foam_Sourced'
			group by dft10.value) dft8 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED = dft8.value
left join (select oou1.omoperatingunitnumber
			, max(dpt1.name) as NAME
		from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dirpartytable dpt1
		inner join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.omoperatingunit oou1 on
			dpt1.recid = oou1.recid
		where oou1.omoperatingunitnumber is not null
		group by oou1.omoperatingunitnumber) dpt2 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE = dpt2.omoperatingunitnumber
left join (select oou1.omoperatingunitnumber
			, max(dpt1.name) as NAME
		from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dirpartytable dpt1
		inner join  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.omoperatingunit oou1 on
			dpt1.recid = oou1.recid
		where oou1.omoperatingunitnumber is not null
		group by oou1.omoperatingunitnumber) dpt3 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT = dpt3.omoperatingunitnumber
where
	convert(
		varchar(25),
		isnull(
			def1.DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
			'1950-01-01'), 120) > '@{variables('v_prv_max_upd_timestamp')}'
